static member StochasticDualCoordinateAscent : Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationContext.BinaryClassificationTrainers * string * string * string * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.ISupportSdcaClassificationLoss * Nullable<single> * Nullable<single> * Nullable<int> * Action<Microsoft.ML.Trainers.LinearClassificationTrainer.Arguments> -> Microsoft.ML.Trainers.LinearClassificationTrainer
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.SdcaBinaryClassificationExtensions.StochasticDualCoordinateAscent (ctx, label, features, weights, loss, l2Const, l1Threshold, maxIterations, advancedSettings)

Docs.param: The binary classification context trainer object.
The custom loss. Defaults to log-loss if not specified.
The L1 regularization hyperparameter. Higher values will tend to lead to more sparse model.
The maximum number of passes to perform over the data.

A delegate to set more settings. The settings here will override the ones provided in the direct method signature, if both are present and have different values. The columns names, however need to be provided directly, not through the .
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a linear binary classification model trained with the SDCA trainer.
